features: 37.5® Technology: 37.5® Technology optimizes your body's microclimate, to maintain an ideal core temperature so you perform better, longer. Made from natural materials, fabrics made with 37.5™ Technology dry up to five times faster than similar fabrics, won't irritate your skin, and will never wash out or degrade.
4 Way stretch: The fabric stretches in all 4 directions with the support of elastic yarns.
Aerotech: Fabric construction with micro holes for better breathability.
